QuestData.Title: Basilisk Butcher
QuestData.Description: Basilisk is one of Nisha's favorite meals. This is where she hunts, and that's likely how those Iron Horde bastards were able to capture her.$b$bWhy would they go to the trouble to subdue her this way? Perhaps together, you and I might learn the answer as we punish them for their transgressions.$b$bFor now, Nisha's going to need some food. While I tend to her, will you do her hunting for her?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Basilisk Meat from Stoneshamble Basilisks or Decaying Basilisks.
QuestData.RewardText: <Nisha downs the meat in one gulp.>
